channel.title: Comments on: Consume OpenWeather REST Api in Dynamics Nav

item.title: By: cikiriz
item.dc:creator: cikiriz
item.content:encoded:
Hi,

I follow all your steps to send request and receive json file from api, but when I try to show value from translatedText node (MESSAGE(FORMAT(Result.translatedText))) , get empty string. It looks like I didn’t set value to this property on custom dll’s. Do you have any tips what I missed?
This is how my json looks
{
“data”: {
“translations”: [
{
“translatedText”: “Some text”,
“detectedSourceLanguage”: “en”
}
]
}
}

item.title: By: Donah
item.dc:creator: Donah
item.content:encoded:
Hi
I am following up on ur blog, it’s very helpful.
i am getting this error while calling the custom dll, i don’t know what else to do, i have done all required steps.
“Cannot create an instance of the following .NET framework objects: Assembly Main, Version=1.0.0.0.”

I am getting this error at the line no
result := result.Main;

Thanks
